body.p: DocBook Targetset documents are used to resolve cross references with the DocBook olink.

section.title: File Definition
section.p: A file is considered to be a Targetset when the root name is targetset.

section.title: Default Document Templates
section.p: A default Map document template is available when creating new documents from templatesnew documents from templates and it can be found in: Framework Templates DocBook Targetset Map .
The default template for DocBook Targetset documents is located in the /frameworks/docbook/templates/Targetset folder.

section.title: Default Schema for Validation and Content Completion
section.p: The default schema, targetdatabase.dtd, for this type of document is stored in /frameworks/docbook/xsl/common/.
